20110112130220.000|20110112130224.000|CC1|IN BRISBANE, AUSTRALIA, THE END 
20110112130224.000|20110112130226.000|CC1|OF A TORRENT AND PEOPLE ARE

20110112130303.000|20110112130306.000|CC1|AREAS OF QUEENSLAND, THE FLOOD  
20110112130306.000|20110112130308.000|CC1|WATERS HAVE WORN DOWN ON THE

20110112130650.000|20110112130653.000|CC1|FOR THE DEAD INTENSIFIES.

20110112130654.000|20110112130655.000|CC1|TO HAVE BEEN CAUGHT IN THEIR    
20110112130655.000|20110112130657.000|CC1|HOMES WHEN THE TORRENT SWEPT

20110112130713.000|20110112130715.000|CC1|CARRIED HUGE DISTANCES BY THE

20110112130720.000|20110112130723.000|CC1|HOTEL BEFORE IT WAS CLAIMED BY  
20110112130723.000|20110112130725.000|CC1|THE RAGING FLOOD.               
20110112130725.000|20110112130727.000|CC1|IN THE MIDDLE OF THIS DISASTER  
20110112130727.000|20110112130729.000|CC1|THERE HAVE BEEN STORIES OF      
20110112130729.000|20110112130733.000|CC1|HEROISM, SWEPT OVER THE RAILWAY 
20110112130733.000|20110112130736.000|CC1|BRIDGE WITH PEOPLE CLINGING TO  
20110112130736.000|20110112130741.000|CC1|THE ROOFTOPS.

20110112130743.000|20110112130745.000|CC1|BRIDGE TO TRY TO SAVE A YOUNG

20110112130749.000|20110112130752.000|CC1|>> THEY HIT THE BRIDGE AND

20110112130755.000|20110112130758.000|CC1|>> SHE DID WELL.                
20110112130758.000|20110112130800.000|CC1|>> WITH ANOTHER STORY TO TELL,  
20110112130800.000|20110112130802.000|CC1|THE FLOOD CUT HIM OFF FROM HIS  
20110112130802.000|20110112130805.000|CC1|WIFE AND CHILDREN.

20110112130807.000|20110112130809.000|CC1|BEFORE HE FOUND OUT THEY HAD

20110112130814.000|20110112130818.000|CC1|NEWS.

20110112130821.000|20110112130824.000|CC1|AND THIS ONE NEIGHBOR WAS FOUND

20110112130850.000|20110112130852.000|CC1|TRYING TO COPE WITH ITS OWN     
20110112130852.000|20110112130853.000|CC1|DISASTER AFTER WEEKS OF         
20110112130853.000|20110112130859.000|CC1|TORRENTIAL RAIN.                
20110112130859.000|20110112130901.000|CC1|LET'S TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF THE
20110112130901.000|20110112130903.000|CC1|OTHER STORIES MAKING HEADLINES  
20110112130903.000|20110112130905.000|CC1|AROUND THE WORLD TODAY.         
20110112130905.000|20110112130906.000|CC1|THE RUSSIAN OFFICIAL REPORTS    
20110112130906.000|20110112130910.000|CC1|INTO THE CRASH THAT KILLED THE  
20110112130910.000|20110112130913.000|CC1|POLISH PRESIDENT.               
20110112130913.000|20110112130914.000|CC1|PILOTS WERE UNDER PRESSURE TO   
20110112130914.000|20110112130917.000|CC1|LAND DESPITE THE VERY BAD       
20110112130917.000|20110112130920.000|CC1|CONDITIONS.                     
20110112130920.000|20110112130920.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS HAD BEEN          
20110112130920.000|20110112130925.000|CC1|ATTEMPTING TO PIECE TOGETHER THE
20110112130925.000|20110112130926.000|CC1|SEQUENCE OF EVENTS.             
20110112130926.000|20110112130928.000|CC1|LAWYERS FOR THE FAMILY OF THE   
20110112130928.000|20110112130930.000|CC1|VICTIMS CALLED THIS ONE-SIDED   
20110112130930.000|20110112130931.000|CC1|AND UNACCEPTABLE.               
20110112130931.000|20110112130934.000|CC1|STEVE ROSENBERG IS IN MOSCOW FOR
20110112130934.000|20110112130935.000|CC1|A SMELL.                        
20110112130935.000|20110112130937.000|CC1|GIVE US THE HEADLINES FROM THIS 
20110112130937.000|20110112130942.000|CC1|REPORT, STEVE.                  
20110112130942.000|20110112130944.000|CC1|>> THE NEWS CONFERENCE WAS VERY 
20110112130944.000|20110112130949.000|CC1|DRAMATIC.                       
20110112130949.000|20110112130951.000|CC1|YOU COULD HEAR THE VOICES OF THE
20110112130951.000|20110112130952.000|CC1|PILOTS ON THE RECORDING IS THE  
20110112130952.000|20110112130953.000|CC1|AIRPLANE CRASHED INTO THE       
20110112130953.000|20110112131002.000|CC1|GROUND.                         
20110112131002.000|20110112131006.000|CC1|THE FIRST MISTAKE OF A CLUE WAS 
20110112131006.000|20110112131009.000|CC1|NOT TO DIVERT THE PLANE TO A    
20110112131009.000|20110112131011.000|CC1|BACK OF THEIR FIELD BUT TO      
20110112131011.000|20110112131013.000|CC1|CONTINUE ONE DESPITE THE BAD    
20110112131013.000|20110112131018.000|CC1|WEATHER CONDITIONS.             
20110112131018.000|20110112131020.000|CC1|THE CREW WAS UNDER STRONG       
20110112131020.000|20110112131022.000|CC1|PSYCHOLOGICAL PRESSURE FROM HIGH
20110112131022.000|20110112131024.000|CC1|RANKING PASSENGERS TO MAKE SURE 
20110112131024.000|20110112131027.000|CC1|THAT THAT PLANE LANDED, IT --   
20110112131027.000|20110112131029.000|CC1|LANDED ON TIME.                 
20110112131029.000|20110112131031.000|CC1|THERE WAS SOME SUGGESTION THAT A
20110112131031.000|20110112131033.000|CC1|NUMBER OF HIGH-RANKING          
20110112131033.000|20110112131035.000|CC1|PASSENGERS WERE IN THE COCKPIT  
20110112131035.000|20110112131040.000|CC1|AT THE TIME OF THE CRASH.       
20110112131040.000|20110112131044.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS SAY THAT THIS     
20110112131044.000|20110112131045.000|CC1|ADDED TO THE PSYCHOLOGICAL      
20110112131045.000|20110112131048.000|CC1|PRESSURE OF THE PILOTS.         
20110112131048.000|20110112131050.000|CC1|>> IT HAS ALL OF THE MAKINGS OF 
20110112131050.000|20110112131053.000|CC1|A PROBLEM BETWEEN TWO COUNTRIES,
20110112131053.000|20110112131100.000|CC1|OF A POLITICAL TIFF.            
20110112131100.000|20110112131102.000|CC1|WHEN RUSSIA DELIVERED A         
20110112131102.000|20110112131105.000|CC1|PRELIMINARY REPORT TO THE CRASH,
20110112131105.000|20110112131108.000|CC1|THE AUTHORITIES WERE MET WITH   
20110112131108.000|20110112131114.000|CC1|SKEPTICISM AND CRITICISM.       
20110112131114.000|20110112131116.000|CC1|WE HAVE NOT HEARD THE OFFICIAL  
20110112131116.000|20110112131119.000|CC1|REACTION YET.
